name: ui_artifact_create
description: Create a new design artifact for an AI design session. The artifact is a working copy that renders in the canvas. Each edit to the artifact animates in real-time.

name.description: Name for the artifact (e.g., 'Hero Section', 'Pricing Card')

source.description: Initial HTML/CSS source. Include <style> block for CSS and HTML elements.

fromComponent.description: Optional: Clone from existing component file path
